synopsis.text: All seems tranquil at the Tendo household, until an unexpected Chinese girl, Lychee, arrives with a vendetta against Happosai for a promise left unfulfilled since her birth. The situation escalates when Kirin and the Seven Lucky Gods Martial Artists kidnap Akane, intending to marry her. Ranma and his friends embark on a journey to Nekonron, China, to save Akane from an unwanted marriage and confront the Seven Lucky Gods in a battle of martial arts prowess. Alongside Lychee, they seek to unravel the mystery surrounding the broken promise and restore peace to their once-normal lives. Prepare for an exciting adventure filled with unexpected twists and turns in this thrilling anime!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
